sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"收成"之意。
means: crop ： 普通用词，侧重指农作物一次收割或一季的收成。
harvest ： 主要指农作物或水果的收获量，有时也指收割的行为。
yield ： 指生产物，农作物的总产量。

word_mean: 收获，采取：从供者取下组织或细胞，保存供移植用

sentence.Network_en: Comet also sired the champion foal out of Spinway Harvest.
sentence.Network_cn: “彗星”还跟“斯平威·哈维斯特”生下了这匹出类拔萃的小马驹。

sentence.Network_en: He will offer the first harvest of rice to the sun goddess.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将把收获的第一束稻子献给太阳女神。

sentence.Network_en: Unfavourable weather has had damaging effects on this year's harvest.
sentence.Network_cn: 恶劣天气使今年的收成受到了损失。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hærfest autumn, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch herfst and German Herbst, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin carpere 'pluck' and Greek karpos 'fruit'

entry.def: The harvest is the gathering of a crop.

example.ex: There were about 300 million tons of grain in the fields at the start of the harvest.
example.tran: 收获伊始地里大概有3亿吨粮食。

entry.def: A harvest is the crop that is gathered in.

example.ex: Millions of people are threatened with starvation as a result of drought and poor harvests.
example.tran: 几百万人因干旱和歉收而受到饥饿的威胁。

entry.def: When you harvest a crop, you gather it in.

example.ex: Many farmers are refusing to harvest the cane.
example.tran: 很多农民正拒绝收割甘蔗。

entry.def: If you harvest a large number of things, you collect them, often by making great efforts.

example.ex: In his new career as a restaurateur he has blossomed and harvested many awards.
example.tran: 转行经营餐饮之后，他在事业上大获成功并获得了许多奖项。

entry.def: If you reap the harvest, you benefit or suffer from the results of your past actions or of someone else's past actions.

example.ex: The Israeli Prime Minister must be convinced that he will reap a richer harvest of votes by going to the electorate well before October.
example.tran: 必须说服以色列总理，若在10月份前就尽早走近选民，他会赢得更多选票。

means.word_mean: 1. the yield from plants in a single growing season
2. the consequence of an effort or activity;
3. the gathering of a ripened crop
2. remove from a culture or a living or dead body, as for the purposes of transplantation;

sentences.sentence: "The Chinese are said to harvest organs from executed criminals"

Sentence.sentence: It is recommended that engineering knowledge and suitable technology in developed countries be introduced to developing countries to improve produce handling in the harvest.
In short, savings are the seed corn of a good economic harvest.

means.word_mean: 收割, 收获;  收获季节, 收获期

sentences.en: After the harvest, the peasants began to prepare the soil for seed.
sentences.cn: 收割后, 农民就开始整地以便播种。

sentences.en: The summer harvest is about to start.
There was a good harvest that year.
It is not easy to reap the harvest of my hard work.
sentences.cn: 获得自己辛勤工作的成果是不容易的。

sentences.en: Try to harvest the fruit before the first frost.
sentences.cn: 在第一次霜冻以前要设法把水果收摘完。

sentences.en: He harvested rewards in fame and wealth for his successful experiment.
sentences.cn: 他因试验成功而名利双收。

jushi.english: It is not easy to reap the harvest of my hard work.
jushi.chinese: 获得自己辛勤工作的成果是不容易的。

jushi.english: After the autumn harvest, the stalks were brown and bare.
jushi.chinese: 秋收后,植物的茎干变得棕黄无叶。

jushi.english: We will have a great corn harvest this year.
jushi.chinese: 我们今年将获得谷物大丰收。
